content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 53, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 16, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a pink_wool, I need to place 1 pink_dye and 1 white_wool side by side in the crafting grid. I will move the pink_dye from slot 16 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 53, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 16, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now move the white_wool from slot 35 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_wool
inventory=[{"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 53, "index": 15}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 16, "index": 45}]
thought: I can now craft the pink_wool and move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
